item.title: NumPyro with Pathfinder
item.description: In this notebook we describe how to use blackjax’s pathfinder implementation to do inference with a numpyro model. I am simply putting some pieces together from the following resources (strongly recommended to read): References: Blackjax docs: Use with Numpyro models Blackjax Sampling Book: Pathfinder Numpyro Issue #1485 PyMC Experimental - Pathfinder Pathfinder: Parallel quasi-Newton variational inference What and Why Pathfinder? From the paper’s abstract: What? We propose Pathfinder, a variational method for approximately sampling from differentiable log densities.
